name: European Signature Dialog (VSiT) - Associated European Trust Centers
goal:
Vision
Our vision is to connect major European e-signature providers to share best practices, develop a common industry viewpoint on regulation issues and empower European solutions for guaranteed data-security.


Strategic objectives:
Enable harmonized cross-border transactions
Promote digitization through more sophisticated, first-class signature products
Achieve international recognition for European Trust services and signature providers
Increase awareness about eIDAS and harmonized standards for European Trust service landscape
Promote personal data protection
Foster and accelerate European digital economy
euInitiatives:
Enable harmonized cross-border transactions focussing the eIDAS regulation

Foster secure digital interaction
